title: Design and Application of a Writing Assessment Model for the BIPA Program

context.prior_knowledge: Beginner-level Indonesian writing proficiency and basic digital literacy
context.additional_context: Course focused on assessing Indonesian writing proficiency used by in-service professionals in workplace contexts, with core objectives including developing effective evaluation methods in technology-constrained environments

learning_goals: Develop the ability to design a writing assessment model utilizing mixed evaluation methods (written exams, assignments, portfolios, and direct observation)
Develop assessment criteria to measure learners' actual language proficiency under the influence of technology dependency (translation tools/AI)
Propose strategies for utilizing digital assessment tools optimized for mobile environments

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
